turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you help me order a drink from Peet's Coffee near me on Manhattan Beach Boulevard?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking for a golden cafe latte, medium in size with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a medium golden cafe latte with coconut milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at peet's on manhattan beach blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Lola, looking forward to it.
